title: Mystery Chest bug?
body: This post official [here](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/its-time-september-bundles-and-mystery-skins) promised mystery chests along with mystery skins, I can't see the chests in store? What's going on?

replies.body: I know that feeling bought 8 mystery gifts cause i thought the chests were not coming and to find out it was actually meant to come at the same time :( â€¦ But i got nice skins anyway from the gifts so I'm not complaining
